content: We donâ€™t have anything like the universal property of the free commutative algebra do we?
docs#MvPolynomial.aeval is the fact that MvPolynomial has the universal property (unicity is surely there in some form). If you want a predicate on an algebra I am not sure.
Thanks. I want a predicate because I want to think about different implementations of the polynomial algebra but still have theorems that apply to both.
